overview:
Jason Coleman is an experienced technologist from Dallas, Texas.

His core expertise is human factors engineering and user experience. He has brought over 100 commercial software and Internet projects to the market, and provided consulting and personnel development services in these areas, with companies that include Adobe, American Airlines, Autonomy, Cigna, Disney, Hallmark, IBM, Juan Valdez, Lynda.com, Macromedia, Magnolia Pictures, MedSynergies, Motel 6, Razorfish, Revlon, Sony, Super Bowl XLI, Staubach, Travelocity, US Air Force, SMU Cox School of Business and Wagner/Cuban.

Mr. Coleman was introduced to programming by his uncle, a career IBM executive, in the early 80â€™s at the age of 12. He has participated in a number of technology startups in a variety of roles including chief technology officer, VP of development, director of product experience, chief creative officer, and design and development principal.

Mr. Coleman received his B.A. from The Colorado College, Summa Cum Laude, where he studied physics, fine arts and anthropology. He also studied architecture and business at Washington University in St. Louis.
